name: Not your dungeon
description:
Take control of the evil dungeon wizards minions as the heroes are trying to take back their dungeon.

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow keys to select a doorway
  • Mouse to select different types of minions
  • More instructions in-game :)

I sadly did not have time to add audio or exciting menus as i have some exams coming up. Any feedback is very appreciated, especially on the difficulty of the game! :)
